revised_title: The Role of Respiration in Blood Motion and Life
tldr: The author, Malachia Thruston, discusses the importance of respiration in maintaining the motion of blood and sustaining life. He explains how respiration supports various motions, such as progressive motion, fluidity, and warmth, in the blood. Thruston also addresses the differences in respiration between born and unborn individuals and provides insights into the role of respiration in fetal life and survival.
